summary: This mod gives better stats to \"The Gauldur Amulet\" and renames it to \"Amulet of Gauldur\" so that it sorts better with other amulets in the inventory.
descriptionHtml:
Elemental Gauldur Amulet v1

This mod gives better stats to \"The Gauldur Amulet\" and renames it to \"Amulet of Gauldur\" so that it sorts better with other amulets in the inventory. The new stats are:

Resist Magic 15%
Resist Fire  35%
Resist Frost 35%
Resist Shock 35%


The old stats with Health, Magicka and Stamina has been removed. The gauldur amulet fragments has not been changed in this mod.

Get the item by completing the Forbidden Legend quest. For more detail, see here: www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Forbidden_Legend

or use the console: player.additem 2d773 1


The Forbidden Legend quest can be started several different ways and can bug out if you are careless. The best way to avoid problems is to make sure you start the quest by reading a book named Lost Legends. An easy to find copy of that book is in the arrogant court wizards quarter in Dragonsreach, Whiterun, in the room to the left of the enchanting table, under a beer flagon.

The quest has a good plot and lots of combat. Take the time to read the lore, well worth it. The final reward in vanilla skyrim, The Gauldur Amulet, is hardly worth wearing though, considering how much better items you can make through enchanting/alchemy. I felt the stats needed to be adjusted, and I choose to do so by giving it elemental resists. 

Elemental Resistance caps at 85%, and is applied after Magic Resist. This means it is well worth getting your resists up to 85% but pointless to get them higher than 85%.

Magic Resistance: Lord Stone gives 25. Agent of Mara gives 15. The three Alteration perks gives 10 each. With the 15 from Gauldurs Amulet in this mod, you reach the hard cap at 85%. I choose to raise Alteration to 70 and spend 3 perk points rather than making this amulet stronger. This way it doesn\'t feel like I am cheating with godlike items.

Nords gets 50% Frost Resistance for free and with the 35 from this mod, you reach the hard cap at 85%. This means you only need to enchant a ring, boot or shield with 50% Fire Resistance and 50% Shock Resistance to reach cap for all resistances.


Compatibility: This mod changes two records:

0x0002D773 dunGauldurAmulet
0x00106FCC dunEnchGauldurAmuletFortifyStats

Any mod that changes these two records will be incompatible. Make sure you load this mod after any mod that do so.



This mod was inspired by Legendary Gauldur Amulet by Zaldir. Thanks Zaldir!
